016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019
020import javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException;
021import java.util.Optional;
022
023public record ClientConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
024
025    public static ClientConfiguration defaults()
026    {
027        return new ClientConfiguration(new Configuration.Builder().build());
028    }
029
030    public record Builder(Configuration.Builder builder) {
031        public Builder() {
032            this(new Configuration.Builder());
033        }
034
035        public Builder isRetryEnabled(boolean value) {
036            builder.add("retry.enabled", value);
037            return this;
038        }
039
040        public Builder retryDelay(String duration) {
041            builder.add("retry.duration", duration);
042            return this;
043        }
044
045        public Builder scheme(String wsOrWss) {
046            builder.add("scheme", wsOrWss);
047            return this;
048        }
049
050        public Builder disruptorSize(int value) {
051            builder.add("disruptor.size", value);
052            return this;
053        }
054
055        public ClientConfiguration build() {
056            return new ClientConfiguration(builder.build());
057        }
058    }
059
060    public boolean isRetryEnabled() {
061        return configuration.getBoolean("retry.enabled").orElse(true);
062    }
063
064    public boolean isRetryable(Throwable throwable)
065    {
066        if (throwable == null)
067            return true;
068
069        if (throwable instanceof SSLHandshakeException) {
070            return false;
071        }
072
073        // TODO Allow includes and excludes in config
074        return true;
075    }
076
077    public String getRetryDelay() {
078        return configuration.getString("retry.delay").orElse("10S");
079    }
080
081    public Optional<String> getScheme() {
082        return configuration.getString("scheme");
083    }
084
085    public int getDisruptorSize() {
086        return configuration.getInteger("disruptor.size").orElse(512);
087    }
088}
